en.title: FE Launches Energy Jewellery with World Renowned Jeweller Mouawad!
en.content:
FE is proud to announce the launching of Energy Jewellery with world renowned jeweller Mouawad (www.mouawad.com). Mouwad is an established company with over 100 years track record specializing in high end jewellery to royal families and to the stars.Mouawad is the company behind some of the world's most famous diamonds such as "Jubilee"  245.35 carats, "The Star of Stanley Ho" 218.08 carats, the largest, flawless, cushion - cut diamond in the world. Supermodel and TV Superstar(Runway) Heidi Klum is a designer for Mouwad with her range of popular jewellery.
Capture the spirit of the Quantum Science Scalar Energy Pendant with the exclusive ENERGY PENDANT by Mouawad.

Encrusted with white diamonds offset by black or brown diamonds, the stunning ENERGY PENDANT enhances the earthy beauty of the Quantum Pendant.

With global operations spanning Asia, Europe and North America - proudly boasting retail outlets in 12 countries, and 6 international production centres - Mouawad has comfortably and successfully continued its legacy of delighting luxury jewellery lovers.

Tapping into the power of Earth's natural minerals, the Quantum Pendant Stone by FusionExcel revives the body by promoting the positive flow of energy.
